3.3

This long overdue update brings major bug fixes and app upgrades to conform to latest Android release. I apologize for not being able to release this sooner! There will be more fixes coming to address other bugs, so if you encounter bugs or issues please do not forget to report them using in-app feedback tool.

Known issues/announcements

  • Readability mode will stop working on April 15 2019 due to API sunset. I am actively working on an alternative solution for this.
  • Certain websites don't load or show up blank in-app. You can try to disable in-app ad blocker to see if it helps. At the same time please file a feedback with the website/article that fails to load so it can be fixed!

Major bug fixes

  • Fix saved story export
  • Fix broken search/catch up
  • Fix HTTP articles not loading in-app on Android P
